synopsis.text: Juri Yukawa lives an unfulfilling life, struggling with unemployment and family issues. Her brother is a shut-in, her father lost his job, and her sister is a single mother. Things take a dire turn when Juri's brother and young nephew are kidnapped, with a steep ransom demanded. Desperate, Juri's grandfather reveals a long-held family secret - a mystical stone that can stop time. Juri enters this frozen world with her father and grandfather, racing against the clock to save their family. However, they soon discover others lurking in this parallel realm. With time running out, Juri and her family must confront unexpected threats and unravel the mysteries of this frozen world to rescue their loved ones. Thrust into extraordinary circumstances, Juri finds herself on a heart-pounding mission through an eerie yet wondrous timeless world. Overcoming the dangers within will require resolve, bravery and trust in one another - but succeeding could mean saving everything she holds dear.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
